EmailTemplate.subject: Is there a right path to grid modernization?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grid modernization is a big deal Choosing the best technology matters The time is right. TDM and Frame Relay carrier services are being discontinued, making way for more reliable, efficient and adaptive technologies. You need to ensure connections with new and existing sites while reducing the use, and escalating costs of obsolete TDM/SONET/SDH equipment. That’s why decision makers need to understand the available grid communications modernization options <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/202113?did=d000000000dy&utm_campaign=utilities_moderniz.&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=benefits-of-ipmpls&utm_term=marketo]]> and choose the best technology and plan for your network. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
